byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and NICK CORASANITI

abstract: Donald J Trump, in unusually candid admission of his sliding poll numbers in several key states, appeals to voters for help and repeats assertions that Hillary Clinton should be seen as in league with enemies of United Sates.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The Republican nominee said that he intended to stick with his unorthodox campaign style, even if it meant taking “a very, very nice long vacation” after Nov. 8.
snippet: The Republican nominee said that he intended to stick with his unorthodox campaign style, even if it meant taking “a very, very nice long vacation” after Nov. 8....

headline.main: Donald Trump Laments Sliding Polls While Maintaining His Provocative Approach
headline.print_headline: Trump Laments Sliding Polls While Maintaining His Provocative Approach
